format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

Salary Slip

Employee ID
Employee Name
Designation
Department
Work Location
PF UAN No. 		:
:
:
:
:
: 		{{ doc.employee }}
{{ doc.employee_name }}
{{ doc.designation }}
{{ doc.department }}
{% set employee = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %} {% if employee.branch %} {{ employee.branch }} {% endif %}
{% if employee.provident_fund_account %} {{ employee.provident_fund_account }} {% endif %}
Salary Slip No :
For the Month :
Total Days :
Worked Days :
ESIC No. :
Mode of Pay :
{{ doc.name }}
{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.end_date, "MMM-yyyy") }}
{% if doc.total_working_days %} {{ doc.total_working_days }} {% endif %}
{% if doc.payment_days %} {{ doc.payment_days }} {% endif %}
{% if employee.esic_no %} {{ employee.esic_no }} {% endif %}
{% if employee.salary_mode %} {{ employee.salary_mode }} {% endif %}
{% set max_rows = max(doc.earnings | length, doc.deductions | length) %} {% for row_index in range(max_rows) %} {% endfor %}
Sr Earnings Amount Deductions Amount
{{ row_index + 1 }} {{ doc.earnings[row_index].salary_component if row_index < doc.earnings | length else '' }} {{ doc.earnings[row_index].get_formatted("amount") if row_index < doc.earnings | length else '' }} {{ doc.deductions[row_index].salary_component if row_index < doc.deductions | length else '' }} {{ doc.deductions[row_index].get_formatted("amount") if row_index < doc.deductions | length else '' }}
Total Gross : {{ doc.get_formatted("gross_pay") }}
 Total Deductions: {{ doc.get_formatted("total_deduction") }}
Employer PF : {% for row in doc.earnings %} {% if row.salary_component == "Basic" %} {% set employer_pf = row.amount * 0.13 %} ₹ {{ "{:.2f}".format(employer_pf) or "0.00" }} {% endif %} {% endfor %} Monthly Bonus : 0
Employer MLWB : Monthly Gratuity : {% for row in doc.earnings %} {% if row.salary_component == "Basic" %} {% set monthly_gratuity = row.amount * 0.0481 %} ₹ {{ "{:.2f}".format(monthly_gratuity) or "0.00" }} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Employer ESIC : {% if doc.gross_year_to_date < 21001 %} {% set employer_esi = doc.gross_pay * (3.25 / 100) %} ₹ {{ "{:.2f}".format(employer_esi) or "0.00" }} {% else %} 0 {% endif %}
Net Pay : {{ doc.get_formatted("net_pay") }} Monthly CTC :
In Words: {{ doc.total_in_words }}
Note: This is a system generated pay slips hence no signature required.
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML"}]
name: Salary Slip Print Format
